page.description: Orientation determines whether the checkboxes are laid out vertically, horizontally, or in columns. If you choose the columns option, you can specify the 'snaking style'. This is either Left-to-Right-Top-to-Bottom (LRTB) or or Top-to-Bottom-Left-to-Right (TBLR). Columns are not supported for ButtonList style.

section.note: You might have to play with the width and height of the control's Field Properties when configuring a checkbox control's orientation. The Field Properties also appear in the control properties list.
